column4: How do I log in as an adminstrator so I can delete stuff etc?
you dont, just use sudo and gksudo

None worked, neither setting xbox ip settings to automated, or restarting the router, though I can connect to the lan, if I remove the "passwd" "user" and "application" forms, but if I use them, trying to connect to my samba file server on this laptop, it cannot get an IP address of the router.
then try adding a static resolve in the hosts file
